name: Funeral for Ato Kebede
description: A gathering to mourn and support the family of Ato Kebede, who passed away last week. Contributions are requested to assist with funeral expenses.

name: Annual Edir General Meeting
description: Yearly meeting to discuss Edir finances, upcoming events, and community support plans. All members are encouraged to attend.

name: Memorial for W/ro Alemnesh
description: A memorial service to honor W/ro Alemnesh on the one-year anniversary of her passing. Contributions will support her family.

name: Support Event for Ato Tadesse’s Family
description: Ato Tadesse’s family has faced a recent hardship. This event is to collect contributions and provide communal support.

name: Edir Founding Anniversary Celebration
description: Celebrating 10 years of our Edir’s establishment with food, music, and community bonding. No contributions required.
